channel.title: Comments on: Gelatissimo – Flavours of the World

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Wow I am jealous! They all look SO good...can you believe I have never yet had the pleasure of trying gelato? The French CrÃ¨me Brulee certainly sounds the most appealing, but I would certainly love to also try the Swiss Toblerone and the Thai Mango and Coconut!
item.content:encoded: Wow I am jealous! They all look SO good…can you believe I have never yet had the pleasure of trying gelato? The French CrÃ¨me Brulee certainly sounds the most appealing, but I would certainly love to also try the Swiss Toblerone and the Thai Mango and Coconut!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Julie - That would be a great idea :) hehehehe
Hi Mr Taste - hahahahah :P The Limoncello was quite nice and refreshing!
Hi Maria - Yes, they do have quite a few lovely flavours.
Hi Arwen - It was a lovely package to receive. :)
Hi Lorraine - lucky you! It was nice, wasn't it? :P
Hi Anita - It's a little cold here too... but we had it inside, so it was good :P
Hi Parita - maybe it's time for some gelato ? hehehe
Hi FFichiban - yep, those two go very well together ... mmmm.. thinking about the creme brulee now..
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Oohh I am loving the sound of fudge brownie and creme brulee mmmm ^^!
item.content:encoded: Oohh I am loving the sound of fudge brownie and creme brulee mmmm ^^!

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Never heard of Gelatissimo, those looks sooo heavenly, m craving for one now:(
item.content:encoded: Never heard of Gelatissimo, those looks sooo heavenly, m craving for one now:(

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: I am jealous. I'd love to be sent a box of new gelato flavours. Nice review The chocolate brownie flavour sounds yum. It's too cold for icecream right now though. Bring on summer
item.content:encoded: I am jealous. I’d love to be sent a box of new gelato flavours. Nice review The chocolate brownie flavour sounds yum. It’s too cold for icecream right now though. Bring on summer

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: Oh cool! We got these too and we had a tasting session with friends :D Lychee coconut was the winner for our group!
item.content:encoded: Oh cool! We got these too and we had a tasting session with friends ðŸ˜€ Lychee coconut was the winner for our group!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That's a nice parcel to receive! The creme brulee flavour does sound good, and a strong lemon gelato is a favourite of mine.
item.content:encoded: That’s a nice parcel to receive! The creme brulee flavour does sound good, and a strong lemon gelato is a favourite of mine.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: I remember trying gelatissimo in queensland, and boy was it good. I wish I could have a free sample sent to me! I know there is a store here in melbourne, but I havent had a chance to swing by and get some more icecream goodness!
item.content:encoded: I remember trying gelatissimo in queensland, and boy was it good. I wish I could have a free sample sent to me! I know there is a store here in melbourne, but I havent had a chance to swing by and get some more icecream goodness!

item.title: By: Mr Taste
item.dc:creator: Mr Taste
item.description:
We used to always hit up Hornsby Gelatissimo and order the 8 "mini-flavours" which was supposed to be 8 teeny tiny scoops of the flavours of your choice, something like $7-8 including a wafer. The trick was to get one of the kids to serve you because they would just use the regular scoop and we would have way too much ice cream for just two people. I like to think they removed it from the menu because of us :P
That limoncello flavour looks pretty enticing though mmmm
item.content:encoded:
We used to always hit up Hornsby Gelatissimo and order the 8 “mini-flavours” which was supposed to be 8 teeny tiny scoops of the flavours of your choice, something like $7-8 including a wafer. The trick was to get one of the kids to serve you because they would just use the regular scoop and we would have way too much ice cream for just two people. I like to think they removed it from the menu because of us ðŸ˜›

That limoncello flavour looks pretty enticing though mmmm
